name: Extreme Uphill Winter Truck
description:
Complete immersive Jeep & truck driving experience in different exciting exotic places. three different exciting environments. Grassy , Desert and Snow terrains.

This jeep 3d game has amazing realistic physics based on motion principles. Drive across the environment and complete your task, as you progress forward you come across different hard obstacles which would give you a challenge. Reach to different points. You dont need to go to a driving school for some driving test to be good at it , just follow your driver instincts , i would hope you have them. Avoid ditches and collision with rocks and other obstacles Throughout whole gameplay, so have to avoid obstacles. Follow the driving pointer to achieve targets and 3D racing game missions. Use powerful front and back gears to climb over mountain in the last missions. Use either tilt ,steering or arrow navigation control at the frightened twists, turns and rounds during the whole jeep. The interesting thing in this game is that you can select a pick up jeep , transport jeep ,Suv 4x4 or Suv pickup truck there are 3 different vehicles that would effect your gameplay and environment during gameplay. This simulation game provides different camera angles exist to gain more jeep racing control and enjoy complete 3d detailed environment with trees, grassland, hills and mountains , a gorgeous desert terrrain , snow environment !. You must conquer the unforgiving hot scorching desert , enjoy 4x4 jeep driving test in a secluded forest island. Check your off-road driving skills over a narrow rocky ridge, overcome tricky mud patches. Reach the target points faster on eye-popping dusty track with your heavy truck or suv truck.
